title: Pentagon Announces Pursuit of Major New Nuclear Weapon
description: A U.S. Air Force B-52 bomber flies over Osan Air Base in Pyeongtaek, South Korea, on Jan. 10, 2016. The powerful U.S. B-52 bomber flew low over South Korea on Sunday, a clear show of force from the United States as a Cold War-style standoff deepened between its ally Seoul and North Korea following Pyongyang's fourth nuclear test. (AP Photo/Ahn Young-joon)
